DOC.brief_title: Learn , Engage , Act , Process ( LEAP ) MOVE
DOC.detailed_description: The Veterans Affairs ( VA ) National Center Health Promotion Disease Prevention ( NCP ) first disseminate MOVE ! weight management program guidance 2006 . Program guidance update 2014 , expect increase engagement improve outcome . However , variation local program high . The overall goal project test Learn . Engage . Act . Process ( LEAP ) intervention work team virtually , build skill implement program improvement . Forty-eight site randomize LEAP intervention use stepped-wedge trial design . LEAP virtually deliver program relies IHI Model Change , online learn platform clinician team share idea progress , audit feedback process , barrier buster tool . The LEAP intervention compare active support provide NCP local VA MOVE ! team . The investigator compare whether team participate LEAP MOVE ! program engage Veterans compare facility participate LEAP . The investigator also collect information understand component LEAP work best scale implement LEAP broadly . The project aim : Aim 1 : To develop three core product enhance NCP support VAMCs pilot LEAP three VAMCs . H1 : Dissemination product enhance NCP support improve MOVE ! outcomes . Aim 2 : To determine effectiveness LEAP plus enhance NCP support ( LEAP+NCP ) versus enhance NCP support alone . H2 : VAMCs LEAP+NCP well MOVE ! group outcomes VAMCs enhance NCP support alone . Aim 3 : To conduct formative cost evaluation refine design LEAP inform future scaling-up LEAP .
